TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpServerUtilityWrapper extends System.Web.HttpServerUtilityBase

summary.span: 封装提供用于处理 Web 请求的 Helper 方法的 HTTP 固有对象。

span.span: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that provides helper methods for processing Web requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自 类，用作类的包装 。The class derives from the class and serves as a wrapper for the class. 此类公开类的功能， 同时公开 类型。This class exposes the functionality of the class while also exposing the type. 通过类，可以将应用程序中类的原始实现替换为 自定义实现，例如在 ASP.NET 管道之外执行单元测试时。The class enables you to replace the original implementation of the class in your application with a custom implementation, such as when you perform unit testing outside the ASP.NET pipeline.

param.span: 可使用此包装类进行访问的对象。

span.span: The object that this wrapper class provides access to.

summary.span: 对 URL 编码的字符串进行解码并将结果输出发送到流。

span.span: Decodes a URL-encoded string and sends the resulting output to a stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `output`参数通过引用传递给 方法。The `output` parameter is passed by reference to the method. 若要在方法完成后检索处理程序的输出，请使用对象的属性和方法 `output` 。To retrieve the output from the handler after the method completes, you use the properties and methods of the `output` object. 有关示例，请参见 。For an example, see .

summary.span: 将字符串编码为仅包含在 URL 中有效的字符。

span.span: Encodes a string to include only characters that are valid in a URL.

summary.span: 使用 base64 数字将字节数组编码为等效的字符串表示形式，以便使其适用于 URL 的传输。

span.span: Encodes a byte array into an equivalent string representation by using base64 digits, which makes it usable for transmission on the URL.

returns.span: 如果 的长度大于 1，则是包含已编码数组的字符串；否则为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The string that contains the encoded array if the length of is greater than 1; otherwise, an empty string ("").
The value of the parameter is .
